DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The function being assigned or passed should be a RTL_GENERIC_COMPARE_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'RTL_GENERIC_COMPARE_ROUTINE PtdMapCompareRoutine;' before the current first declaration of PtdMapCompareRoutine.

The function being assigned or passed should be a RTL_GENERIC_ALLOCATE_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'RTL_GENERIC_ALLOCATE_ROUTINE PtdMapAllocateRoutine;' before the current first declaration of PtdMapAllocateRoutine.

The function being assigned or passed should be a RTL_GENERIC_FREE_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'RTL_GENERIC_FREE_ROUTINE PtdMapFreeRoutine;' before the current first declaration of PtdMapFreeRoutine.

Consider using 'error logging or driver shutdown' instead of 'KeBugCheck'. Reason: Whenever possible, all kernel-mode components should log an error and continue to run, rather than calling KeBugCheck.
